input.sentences: co workers enjoy each other 's company .
this woman happily picks up the phone .
the man looks at the computer screen .
a higher ranked employee gives orders to the doctor .
he overlooked the operations of the hospital .
output.sentences: Although working at a hospital is difficult work, sometimes there is time to just enjoy the company of others.
However, answering the phone is more important than chatting.
On occasion, a supervisor will come around to do some training.
He might talk with the doctors to see if there are any issues that management needs to address.
When any issues are solved, everyone is happy to see positive reviews of their work.
